headTitle: ICRAFT - Design, Websites, Branding - Located in Franklin, South Auckland.
headDescription: Get your business or personal website needs met with our affordable, fast, secure and engaging websites. We are situated in Auckland so if your local we can meet you :)
jumbotronSubSubTitle: Want to know what we can do for you? Then hit the ignition button below to find out.

items.name: intro
items.title: LOOKING TO UPGRADE YOUR DIGITAL PRESENCE?
items.text: Here at ICRAFT we provide a range of quality solutions that will boost your online presence or make your day-to-day more efficient. For more info you can get in touch with us today.

items.name: websites
items.title: STUNNING, FAST AND SECURE WEBSITES
items.text: ICRAFT's Top Quality websites are hand crafted to support your brand. On-top of that, they also come with some of the lowest on-going costs out there!

items.name: branding
items.title: PERSONALISED BRANDED CONTENT
items.text: From Logo's to Flyer's to Business Cards and the good stuff in between. We create unique and impacting content that helps your business stand out for the right reasons.

items.name: it solutions
items.title: IMPROVE YOUR WORKFLOW TOOLS
items.text: This modern age is full of helpful tools to help you focus on what you do best. ICRAFT can help find the right tools for you.
